title: Carrier (for Control Technology Package)
content: If the front storage space is not enough, there is always the optional carrier. It is ideal for attaching panniers, making it perfect for longer bike trips too. The carrier can carry up to 15 kg of weight. Since it is secured directly to the frame, it also benefits from the suspension thanks to Control Technology.

warnings: Format mismatch: Missing card-info container, Missing "More Information" button
Minor format differences: Missing border-radius styling, Missing box-shadow styling
